Template.Description: Creates a MOBA CAN sensor with a single measurement value message id.
Template.TargetFolderHint: Choose the collection project folder as target folder.

MacroDefinition.Name: SENSOR_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the sensor in lower case. Must not contain whitespace. Example: slope_sensor or wire_rope

MacroDefinition.Name: FAMILY_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the family to which the sensor belongs, without the leading 'family_'. This depends on what the sensor is measuring. Look into symbiosis libraries for available families. Example: length_sensor

MacroDefinition.Name: CAN_MSG_ID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the CAN message which contains the measurement value. Example: 0x00AA

MacroDefinition.Name: MEAS_DIM
MacroDefinition.Description: The phsysical dimension measured by the sensor. This is the type of the main metabolic of the family. Example: length or angle

MacroDefinition.Name: MSG_ID_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: An abbreviated name which is appended to 'can_msg_id_'. Example: rot or len

MacroDefinition.Name: OBJECT_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name with which the sensor appears in the agora and demiurg. Example: MobaRotation
